scripts.youtube:clean: rm -f youtube_enhance_progress.json && echo 'Progress files cleaned up'
scripts.youtube:help: echo 'YouTube Parser Commands:' && echo '  pnpm youtube:parse     - Parse YouTube videos by #zara hashtag' && echo '  pnpm youtube:subscribers - Fetch subscriber counts for authors' && echo '  pnpm youtube:enhance    - Enhance videos with views, likes, comments' && echo '  pnpm youtube:all        - Run complete pipeline (recommended)' && echo '  pnpm youtube:clean      - Clean up progress files' && echo '  pnpm youtube:help       - Show this help message'
